txt.en:
'Something must have been watching us and stole our supplies while we were gone! I cannot find any footprints in the mud, so it must be someone, or something, small andâ€¦'

Rhadrog interrupts himself with a sudden coughing fit.

'Ugh. I'm fine, truly. See if you can find the thief's trail nearby. It could not have gone far.'
TBD Follow the trail, go find the thief
'Too late! Your stuff hidden now! You never find it without me!  Won't help you anyway, I know how to stop sickness, you don't! Green-cloak guy not looking so good, is he? Hehehe!'
'That troublesome goblin! This thicket must be where he lives. Thankfully, Rhadrog was keen-eyed enough to find this place before his ailments worsened. I'm afraid he doesn't look well now.'
'You're not going anywhere until you return our supplies, thief. I suggest you be quick about it.'
TBD Your stuff was stolen, go find the thief
'You better let me go, or I tell you nothing!'
'Confound it! He leaves us no choice. Have it your way, goblin filth. But this I vow: run, and I will hunt you down.'
You see the goblin being stuffed into a sack and carried away by an Orc
While chasing the goblin thief, you were ambushed by crazed Orcs.\n\nYou should defeat your ambushers!
The goblin has been carried off, but Rhadrog seems to have found his hideout nearby.\n\nYou should find Viznak's hideout.
While out scouting, someone rifled through the Ranger camp and stole all of Rhadrog and Faeron's supplies. Follow the trail and track down the thief.
Faeron can be found at Viznak's hideout.\n\nYou should talk to Faeron.
'Hmm? You follow me?! Your stuff mine now! Not giving back!'
A thief stole supplies from the Agarnaith Ranger camp and fled into the swamp.\n\nYou should follow the thief's trail.
A lone boot rests on the path
A dagger was left behind here
An empty sack lies in the road
Someone took a bite out of this loaf and then discarded it
'Oooo, so scary! I'm out of here! Hahaha!'
The trail has led you to a young goblin standing by the path.\n\nYou should confront the thief.
'Thanks, but what happened to the thief? I thought you had cornered him... I suddenly feel a bit ill...
The goblin thief has run east, deeper into the swamp.\n\nYou should chase after the thief!
'Ah, good work, Rhadrog. This must be that scamp's hideout.'
